topic.title: Hammer Command Preparation
topic.shortdesc: During the steps in this document, the hammer command is used to more easily perform the configurations.

body.p: Usage of the hammer command requires identifiers for the various pieces of information stored within the Foreman server. This includes identifiers for the defined installation media, partitions, templates, hosts, as well as other items. A checklist file, dell-pilot-checklist.pdf, is available to easily keep track of this information.
Several steps in this document use files to configure the environment. These files are available in a tar file called dell-pilot-deploy.tgz.

ol.li: Download and print the Dell Pilot Checklist from https://wiki.opencrowbar.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=6326050.
Write the various information gathered and needed on the checklist for reference as needed.
